# -*- CMakeLists.txt generated by CodeLite IDE. Do not edit by hand -*-

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.11)

# Project name
project(PassTCP)

# This setting is useful for providing JSON file used by CodeLite for code completion
set(CMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS 1)

# Set default locations
set(CL_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Build/cmake-build-Release/output)
set(CMAKE_LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CL_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY})
set(CMAKE_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CL_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY})
set(CMAKE_ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CL_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY})

set(CONFIGURATION_NAME "Release")

# Projects


# Top project
# Define some variables
set(PROJECT_PassTCP_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}")
set(WORKSPACE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Build")



#{{{{ User Code 1
# Place your code here
#}}}}

include_directories(
    .
    .
    ../Base/thirdparty/toluapp-master/include
    ../Base/thirdparty
    ./PassTCP
    ../Base/include
    ../Base/include/TinyXML
    ../Base/include/Lua
    ../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib

)


# Compiler options
execute_process(COMMAND 
    wx-config --cxxflags --unicode=yes --debug=no
    OUTPUT_VARIABLE
    CL_TMP_VAR
    OUTPUT_STRIP_TRAILING_WHITESPACE)
string(STRIP ${CL_TMP_VAR} CL_VAR_1)
execute_process(COMMAND 
    wx-config --cxxflags --unicode=yes --debug=no
    OUTPUT_VARIABLE
    CL_TMP_VAR
    OUTPUT_STRIP_TRAILING_WHITESPACE)
string(STRIP ${CL_TMP_VAR} CL_VAR_2)
add_definitions(${CL_VAR_1})
add_definitions(${CL_VAR_2})
add_definitions(-O2)
add_definitions(-Wall)
add_definitions(
    -DNDEBUG
    -D_LINUX_PLATFORM_
    -D_FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64
    -DWXUSINGDLL
    -D__WXGTK__
)


# Linker options
execute_process(COMMAND 
    wx-config --debug=no --libs --unicode=yes
    OUTPUT_VARIABLE
    CL_TMP_VAR
    OUTPUT_STRIP_TRAILING_WHITESPACE)
string(STRIP ${CL_TMP_VAR} CL_VAR_3)
set(LINK_OPTIONS ${CL_VAR_3})


if(WIN32)
    # Resource options
    execute_process(COMMAND 
        wx-config --rcflags
        OUTPUT_VARIABLE
        CL_TMP_VAR
        OUTPUT_STRIP_TRAILING_WHITESPACE)
    string(STRIP ${CL_TMP_VAR} CL_VAR_4)
    set(RC_OPTIONS ${CL_VAR_4})
endif(WIN32)

# Library path
set(CMAKE_LDFLAGS "${CMAKE_LDFLAGS} -L. ")

# Define the C sources
set ( C_SRCS
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib/lparser.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib/ltable.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib/lobject.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib/lopcodes.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib/ltablib.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib/ltm.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib/lvm.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib/ldblib.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib/tolua_is.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib/toluabind.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib/tolua_map.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib/lcode.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib/print.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib/lstrlib.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib/lstring.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib/tolua_event.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib/tolua_to.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib/lzio.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib/lmem.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib/lauxlib.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib/lundump.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib/loadlib.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib/lmathlib.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib/llex.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib/liolib.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib/linit.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib/lgc.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib/tolua_push.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib/loslib.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib/lfunc.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib/ldump.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib/ldo.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib/lstate.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib/ldebug.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib/lbaselib.c
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/LuaLib/lapi.c
)

# Define the CXX sources
set ( CXX_SRCS
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/PassTCP/PacketDlg.cpp
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/PassTCP/PassTCPDlg.cpp
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/PassTCP/ClientUdpSocket.cpp
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/include/TinyXML/tinyxml.cpp
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/PassTCP/PassTCPApp.cpp
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/include/TinyXML/tinyxmlerror.cpp
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/include/TinyXML/tinyxmlparser.cpp
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/include/Lua/LuaFn.cpp
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/include/TinyXML/tinystr.cpp
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/PassTCP/ClientTcpSocket.cpp
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../Base/thirdparty/sock_wrap.cpp
)

set_source_files_properties(
    ${CXX_SRCS} PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS 
    " -O2 -Wall -pthread")

set_source_files_properties(
    ${C_SRCS} PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS 
    " -O2 -Wall -pthread")

if(WIN32)
    enable_language(RC)
    set(CMAKE_RC_COMPILE_OBJECT
        "<CMAKE_RC_COMPILER> ${RC_OPTIONS} -O coff -i <SOURCE> -o <OBJECT>")
endif(WIN32)



#{{{{ User Code 2
# Place your code here
#}}}}

add_executable(PassTCP ${RC_SRCS} ${CXX_SRCS} ${C_SRCS})
target_link_libraries(PassTCP ${LINK_OPTIONS})

target_link_libraries(PassTCP
    /usr/lib/libpthread.so
    /usr/lib/libdl.so
)
